text: The meal offering with it shall be two tenths of an efah23:13 1 efah is about 22 litres or about 2/3 of a bushel of fine flour mixed with oil, an offering made by fire to the LORD for a pleasant aroma; and the drink offering with it shall be of wine, the fourth part of a hin.23:13 A hin is about 6.5 litres or 1.7 gallons.
